content: Compound 1 was prepared by the hydrothermal method: A mixture of Cd(NO3)2·4H2O (0.1542 g, 0.50 mmol), NaOH (0.04 g, 1 mmol), tzba (0.0951 g, 0.5 0 mmol), and deionized water (15 mL) was stirred at room temperature for 30-min, then transferred and sealed in a 25 mLTelfon-lined reactor and heated at 180 °C for 5 days. After slow cooling to room temperature, yellow block crystals were filtered and washed with distilled water. (yield 30 % based on Cd). Anal. calcd (%) for C8H4CdN4O3: C, 30.35; H, 1.27; N, 17.70; Cd, 35.51. Found: C, 30.37; H, 1.28; N, 17.74; Cd, 35.56.
clean_text:
Synthesis

Compound 1 was prepared by the hydrothermal method: A mixture of Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (0.1542 g, 0.50 mmol), NaOH (0.04 g, 1 mmol), tzba (0.0951 g, 0.5 0 mmol), and deionized water (15 mL) was stirred at room temperature for 30-min, then transferred and sealed in a 25 mLTelfon-lined reactor and heated at 180 °C for 5 days. After slow cooling to room temperature, yellow block crystals were filtered and washed with distilled water. (yield 30 % based on Cd). Anal. calcd (%) for C8H4CdN4O3: C, 30.35; H, 1.27; N, 17.70; Cd, 35.51. Found: C, 30.37; H, 1.28; N, 17.74; Cd, 35.56.
